doc.title: Ghost Rider
doc.plot: Kevin Bailey is the new kid in school, he's shy in his new surroundings and feels like an outsider. After school he gets on his first bus ride home and meets a girl who befriends him. When the girl drops her pencil, Kevin picks it up, as he gets ready to return it to her she is no longer there. As he gets off the bus he looks at the name on the pencil, which reads Tracy Donnelly. Latter that night he finds out that the house he and his family have just moved into is the old Donnelly house, it seems the Donnely's moved out because their daughter Tracy died in a school bus accident and the house held to many memories for them to stay. Kevin then realized the girl who befriended him on his ride home was in fact the ghost of Tracy. The next day he sees Tracy again and they become friends, this time she gives him a pamphlet on school bus safety to read. It seems there is another school bus crash coming up and Kevin must take the lead in helping the other students before it's to late.
